forecastday.title: Monday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy early with peeks of sunshine expected late. High 19C. Winds WNW at 15 to 25 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy skies early, then partly cloudy this afternoon. High 66F. Winds WNW at 10 to 15 mph.

forecastday.title: Monday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Mostly clear. Low 11C. Winds WNW at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Clear to partly cloudy. Low 51F. Winds WNW at 10 to 15 mph.

forecastday.title: Tuesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Sunny along with a few clouds. High around 20C. Winds WNW at 15 to 25 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Generally sunny despite a few afternoon clouds. High 68F. Winds WNW at 10 to 15 mph.

forecastday.title: Tuesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Mainly clear early, then a few clouds later on. Low 12C. Winds W at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Mainly clear early, then a few clouds later on. Low 54F. Winds W at 10 to 15 mph.

forecastday.title: Wednesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy skies in the morning will give way to cloudy skies during the afternoon. High 19C. Winds W at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy skies during the morning hours will become overcast in the afternoon. High 66F. Winds W at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Wednesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy skies with some evening fog. Low 13C. Winds WNW at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy skies with some evening fog. Low near 55F. Winds WNW at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Thursday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Considerable clouds early. Some decrease in clouds later in the day. High 19C. Winds NW at 15 to 25 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Mostly cloudy skies early will become partly cloudy later in the day. High 66F. Winds NW at 10 to 15 mph.

forecastday.title: Thursday Night

forecastday.title: Friday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Intervals of clouds and sunshine. High 19C. Winds NW at 15 to 25 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy skies. High 67F. Winds NW at 10 to 15 mph.

forecastday.title: Friday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy skies early will give way to considerable cloudiness and fog after midnight. Low 13C. Winds WNW at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy skies during the evening. Fog developing overnight. Low near 55F. Winds WNW at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Saturday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy skies early, followed by partial clearing. High 19C. Winds NW at 15 to 25 km/h.

forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy. Low 54F. Winds NW at 10 to 15 mph.

forecastday.title: Sunday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: A few passing clouds, otherwise generally sunny. High 19C. Winds WNW at 15 to 25 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: A few passing clouds, otherwise generally sunny. High 66F. Winds WNW at 10 to 15 mph.

forecastday.title: Sunday Night

forecastday.title: Tuesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Clear skies early. Becoming mostly cloudy with showers developing later at night. Low 13C. Winds SSW at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 50%.
